loans.use: to buy more palm oil and soap to increase her business.

loans.name: Pedro Enmanuel

texts.es:
Pedro Emmanuel es un joven que desea estudiar Mercadotecnia, él solicita un préstamo para poder pagar sus estudios, esta es su historia:Mi nombre es Pedro Emmanuel, tengo 20 años de edad. Vivo en santo domingo este Rep. dom., soltero, tengo una hermana y mis padres son divorciados. Vivo con mi madre la cual es no vidente desde los 7 años de edad  pero esto no ha sido impedimento para poder sacar a su familia adelante, actualmente esta jubilada  pese que en nuestro país los trabajos para las personas con esas condiciones son escasos.
Tengo mucho anhelo de estudiar mercadotecnia, carrera en la cual me identifico desde que estaba cursando mi bachillerato, Quisiera ingresar a la universidad APEC. A pesar de haber finalizado mis estudias hace dos años se me ha hecho difícil iniciar los estudios universitarios, es por esto que acudo a esta ayuda.
Necesito esta ayuda porque es la vía para poder alcanzar y hacer realidad mis sueños. Con el logro de mis metas de ser un gran profesional en el área de mercadeo podre darle una mejor calidad de vida a mi familia.
Dentro de mis sueños esta ocupar un puesto en el área de mercadeo antes de terminar mi carrera en una prestigiosa empresa, así al momento de finalizar mis estudios universitarios mis conocimientos académicos se complementaran con los conocimientos laborales adquiridos y así poder ocupar el mejor cargo en el área.
texts.en:
Pedro Emmanuel is a young man who wants to study marketing. He is applying for a loan to be able to pay for his studies. This is his story:

My name is Pedro Emmanuel. I am 20 years old. I live in East Santo Domingo, in the Dominican Republic. I am single. I have a sister, and my parents are divorced. I live with my mother, who hasn't been able to see since she was 7 years old, but this has not been an impediment in being able to raise her family. Now she is retired, even though in our country jobs are scarce for people with these conditions.

I have a great desire to study marketing, a career with which I identified since I was in secondary school. I would like to enter the APEC University. In spite of having completed my [secondary] studies two years ago, it has been difficult for me to begin university studies. It is for this reason that i have turned to this [source of] help.

I need this help because it is the way to be able to reach and make a reality of my dreams. With the achievement of my goals of being a great professional in the area of marketing, I will be able to give a better quality of life to my family.

Part of my dreams is to have a position in the area of marketing with a prestigious business before finishing my course of study. Thus at the time I finish my university studies, my academic knowledge will be complemented with acquired working knowledge and I will thus be able to occupy the best positions in the area.

loans.use: to pay for his studies in marketing

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José de 32 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maíz y pipián desde hace varios años, de esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable,  no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia, vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas,  etc. asi como muestra la fotografía. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
José is 32 and has been growing corn and squash for several years. This is how he earns a living and is able to support his household. He is a very hard-working, honest and responsible man who never tires of working and proving the best for his family. He lives in his own home with his wife and son. 

He has made the decision to request a loan in order to buy the main agricultural supplies: manures, pest spray, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc., as shown in the photo. He hopes to have favorable results, as he has no other source of income. He trusts in God that he will succeed in obtaining an abundant harvest which will allow him to continue supporting his household.

loans.use: To buy manures, pest spray, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Meet 37-year-old Marie from Waterloo 2 Western rural area in Freetown. She is married with two children. Her children are currently attending school. twenty years ago, Marie established her cake business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business twelve hours per day and seven days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are lack of enough capital to expand her business and price inflation.

Marie requires a loan in order to buy flour, cooking oil, and sugar to expand her cake business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and have a permanent business location. In the future; Marie plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, and sugar to expand her cake business

loans.name: Adilia Del Rosario

texts.es: Adilia es una mujer emprendedora, originaria de la ciudad de Jinotega. De 33 años de edad y madre soltera de 2 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras. Ella inicio su negocio hace cinco años, motivada por personas de la  comunidad quienes necesitaban un puesto de frutas y verduras debido a que no contaban con uno, fue así que Adilia estableció su negocio en su casa. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que satisfacera las necesidades de sus clientes, obtendrá mayores ventas e ingresos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: piña, banano, manzanas, uvas, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, entre otros con el fin de surtir su negocio. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio. Su plan próximo es invertir mucho más y crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Adilia is an entrepreneurial woman, originally from the city of Jinotega. She is 33 years old and the single mother of two children. She is a businesswoman. She sells fruits and vegetables. She began her business five years ago, motivated by people in the community who needed a fruit and vegetable stand because they didn't have one. It was thus that Adilia established her business in her house. She estimates that the loan will be of great help, since she will satisfy the needs of her customers, and she will obtain better sales and income. She is applying for the loan to buy pineapples, bananas, apples, grapes, tomatoes, peppers, and onions, among other items, with the goal of stocking her business. Her future plan is to improve the infrastructure of her business. Her next plan is to invest much more and grow in her business.

loans.use: to buy pineapples, bananas, apples, grapes, tomatoes, peppers, and onions, among other items.

loans.name: Rosa Ivania

texts.es: Rosa Ivania, habita en Managua y desde hace muchos años ayuda fuertemente a su esposo que tiene su trabajo de conductor. Ella ha tenido la visión de tener más que una fuente de ingreso para su familia, porque de esta manera ha podido educar a sus dos hijos, a pesar que la tarea aun no termina con su hijo de 17 años de edad que estudia. Doña Rosa solicita el crédito para la compra de una variedad de productos cosméticos de la marca AVON y joyas de plata que comercializa en casa, sus clientes se encuentran satisfechos con la calidad y variedad de sus productos, especialmente con las facilidades de pago que Rosa ofrece.
texts.en:
Rosa Ivania lives in Managua and for many years has been greatly helping her husband, who has his job as a driver. She has had the vision of having more than one source of income for their family, because in this way she has been able to educate their two children, despite the spite the fact that the task is still not completed with his 17-year-old son who goes to school. 

Rosa is requesting the loan to buy a variety of Avon brand cosmetic products and silver jewelry that she sells at home. Her customers are satisfied with the quality and variety of her product, especially with the payment terms that Rosa offers.

loans.use: To buy a variety of Avon brand cosmetic products and silver jewelry.

loans.name: Maria Romilia

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cinco hijos, desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maíz y yuca con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. Ella quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Maria lives in a house of her own with her husband and five children. She has been working as a farmer for many years now, which is her main source of income. She cultivates corn and cassava and with her earnings she is able to settle some of her household expenses.

Maria wishes to purchase the necessary supplies for her crops such as compost, fertilizer, seeds, pest control, herbicide, etc. Since she does not have the necessary economical resources for this investment, she has decided to apply for a loan as its the only way she can continue her farming process.

Just like any other farmer, she trusts in agriculture since she doesn't have any other source of income. She hopes to obtain an abundant harvest which will allow her to continue providing her household with their daily bread and to settle this loan.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer, seeds, pest control, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Maritza Estela

texts.es: Maritza de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad,  ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos como: pastelitos de carnes, yuca,  empanas,  atoles, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la higiene con que los realiza, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para gastos personales necesita comprar  algunos artículos de primera necesidad que hacen falta en su casa y que con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder comprarlos y así pueda vivir mejor con su familia sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
Maritza is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and her two children, who are 12 and 8 years old. She works selling snacks such as pastelitos de carne [meat-filled pastries], cassava, pasties, and atoles [corn-based hot drinks]. Her business is based in her home, and she has many customers thanks to her good prices and level of hygiene.

She is seeking a loan for personal expenses, as she needs to buy essential items that are lacking in her home, and what she earns is not enough to afford them. This way she will be able to live better with her family without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy essential items for her home.

loans.name: Sonia Margarita

texts.es: Sonia de 50 años de edad se dedica a la venta de tamales y atol de elote desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la higiene con que prepara los alimentos y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que gana de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 20 y 22 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, doña Sonia esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de elotes por mayor para poder seguir produciendo mas alimentos y así obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Sonia, who is 50, has been selling tamales (steam-cooked corn dough wrapped in banana leaves) and atol de elote (a sweet corn and milk drink) for several years.  She works from home and has a lot of customers who appreciate the hygienic way in which she prepares the food and the friendly service she offers.  With her earnings, she manages to pay some of the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her husband and two children, who are 20 and 22 and both studying at the moment.
  
Sonia is asking for a loan to buy corn in bulk so she can continue preparing the food, which will allow her to make more money and provide her family with more economic stability.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a spraying machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, shorts, blouses, skirts, etc for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a range of clothing, such as skirts, pants, blouses, T-shirts, suits, etc.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is 30 years old and he lives in the village of Goght in Kotayk region. He lives with his retired mother and together, they perfectly manage their farm. Unfortunately, several years ago Armen’s father died and now he is responsible for his mother’s care.  On his farm, Armen has two cows, two heifers, two bulls and two calves. He also cultivates fruit and vegetables on the land. From the garden he manages to sell nuts, pear and grapes among other things.  They use the vegetables mainly for their own consumption. They also sell meat and different dairy-products to the local food markets. Besides all these jobs, Armen is also engaged in cultivation of Holland roses in a greenhouse. The flowers bring not only financial profit to his family but also beauty and nice aroma that is spread around their house making people envy Armen's job.
So Armen is asking for a loan of 900.000 Armenian drams in order to pay for feed for his farm cattle and he also plans to get married and needs some money for that.

loans.use: To pay for various farming needs like feed for his cattle, and also assist him with wedding costs for his future wedding

loans.name: Maya

texts.en:
Maya is from the Chaitura district, West Georgia. She is 37 years old and married with a school age daughter. Maya’s husband owns a car and serves the locals as a taxi driver to earn a living. 
Maya has graduated from pedagogical college and works as a teacher at the local nursery school. Unfortunately, a teacher’s salary is very small so Maya decided she should generate additional income.
She requests a loan to renovate a room in her house to start a special education and rehabilitation centre for disabled children there.
Children who have physical, mental and developmental disabilities will be provided with education according to their intellectual level. The center will work on weekends, when other schools are closed.
Maya has experience with disabled children and she can handle this challenge well. Maya loves children very much and hopes her project will be useful for them.

loans.use: to renovate a room in her home to start special education and a rehabilitation centre for disabled children

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: Felipa de 64 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar  vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo quien trabaja y ayuda en la casa. Ella posee una tortillería la cual es muy conocida en la localidad donde reside, tiene muchos clientes pues vende las mejores tortillas, calientitas y con el servicio más rápido además a precios realmente accesibles; doña Felipa es una mujer emprendedora con ganas de  salir adelante, tiene una actitud de ganadora, por eso siempre se mantiene adelante de la competencia, ella piensa que cuando alguien desea algo debe saber que corre riesgos y por eso la vida vale la pena, quiere correr el riesgo para poder hacer crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y cal. Ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para su familia.
texts.en:
Felipa, 64, lives in a relative’s house with her lifelong partner and her son, who works and helps in the house.  She has a tortilla bakery which is very well-known in the area where she lives.  She has a lot of customers because she sells the best hot tortillas, with the quickest service and at really good prices.

Felipa is an entrepreneurial woman who wants to succeed.  She has a winning mentality which helps her to always stay ahead of the competition.  She believes that when somebody wants something, they should know that the risks involved make life worthwhile.  She is willing to take a risk to try and expand her business.  That is why she is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan which will allow her to buy corn in bulk and lime powder.  She hopes that this way, she will be able to provide economic stability for her household and a full life for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk and lime powder

loans.name: Achiri Alice

texts.en:
This is Achiri Alice, she is married and has six children. They all live in a six bedroom apartment in Bamenda in the North West Region of Cameroon.  she   has faced many challenges in life like: sickness, theft of all her business items, death of her family members and inadequate finance to start up a business of her own to fulfill her family's needs.
With this new loan, she will invest in buying more piglets, chickens, feed, and seedlings. She holds a positive view of this business succeeding because she has been doing it for a long time and the demand for pigs and chickens is high.  In addition, the waste from chickens and pigs will be used in the farm as fertilizer to increase the yield. With this business activity, the community will benefit from the manure and greater availability of chickens and pigs for different occasions. With the profit from this loan, she will support her family's needs, ensure her childrens' education is paid for, expand her poultry and pig farm and also save some money to undertake bigger investments in the future. She prefers loans form GHAPE because of the low interest rates, convenient repayment timeframe and also, because borrowers are trained in marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed.

loans.use: To buy chicks, piglets, feed and seedlings

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Rugiatu from Waterloo Eastern area in Freetown. She is married with one child age 20 years. In 2000, Rugiatu established her charcoal business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business 12 hours per day and 7 days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are transportation and price changes.

Rugiatu requires a loan in order to buy more bags of charcoal to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and take care of her family's welfare. In the future, Rugiatu plans to change her business to a big provision shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to expand her business.
